alert.note: Alert for Crowley; Pueblo (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 29 at 8:09PM MDT until May 29 at 8:45PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Crowley County in southeastern Colorado... Northeastern Pueblo County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 845 PM MDT. * At 809 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles northeast of Pueblo Depot, or 25 miles northeast of Pueblo, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Crowley and northeastern Pueblo Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
